reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater vest to be better than expected, with good material quality and soft texture.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Want a Sweater Vest to complete your outfit?
items.body: Super cute sweater vest. Great quality and true to size. If your team color is gold, this is the perfect color sweater vest for those chilly football games. Read more
items.author: Jill Weeks Ramey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: The sweater vest is exactly what I was looking for, it’s lightweight, soft, and fits true to size. I’m 5’3 and 220lbs and it fits perfectly. I love the side slit it makes it sit comfortably without looking bunched up at the bottom. I will definitely be buying for colors! Read more
items.author: Mia Ramos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like the picture
items.body: Excellent quality. True to size. Looks like the picture. Would buy again. Read more
items.author: PEGGYALLEN

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars i like it
items.body: I like this vest. Wear it as it is shown. I got my regular size and it fits fine, but I do wish it was a tad longer. I wish I had gone up a size and had an oversized fit, as I don't think one size would be too big. Nice weight, not cheap or thin looking. Soft and comfortable. Color looks as pictured. Read more
items.author: tracey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Super comfortable sweater. Can easily be layered, dressed up or down. Not super thick so it’s not very warm. It is comfortable and soft. Read more
items.author: Emma Mauck

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wardrobe extra
items.body: This is an ideal piece to mix up the wardrobe. It's not overly thick yet not thin. Another person commented that the ribbing was flat and not thick (raised) as pictured. Duh! The garment was vacuumed packed so of course the ribbing is flat straight out out the package! While the laundry instructions recommend line drying, the garment is perfectly fine to tumble in the dryer for 15 minutes before the first wear. It comes out nicely with well defined ribbed patterns! Buy it! I bought the navy blue one which isn't a deep navy but works perfectly with my dark navy slacks and thinly striped blouse! Jeans will work too! For reference, I'm 5'9" 178 lbs with broad shoulders. I normally wear size 14 blouses and 16 blazers/jackets. Size XL suits me well - not tight and not too loose! Read more
items.author: Marci

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shrinks
items.body: This is a super cute sweater vest but it shrunk up oddly small after one wash. I would suggest sizing up Read more
items.author: David G-Ohio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest sweater vest!!!
items.body: Cutest sweater vest, complete comfort, and style. It’s the perfect length and flattering fit. Can’t recommend enough!! Read more
items.author: Kristin Walker

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Blue, Grass Green, Reddish Brown, Silver Gray, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Orange, Yellow Green, Red, Rose Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
